title: Bajaj Auto total sales flat at 3.55 lakh units in May
description: Bajaj Auto's sales remained flat at 3,55,323 units in May. The automaker had sold 3,55,148 units in May 2023. Total domestic sales declined 1 per cent to 2,25,087 units in May from 2,28,401 units sold in the year-ago period. Exports rose 3 per cent at 1,30,236 last month from 1,26,747 previous May.
